TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Ayal_Komod, title = Ayal_Komod, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ayal_Komod} }

S.FORM: 張震嶽 I 1974 a miheca saka 5 folad saka 2 a romi'ad itini i Taywan Ilan siyen Soaw cen ko kahofocan ningra, o 'Amis/Pangcah cingra, o misoritay to fangcalay a radiw cingra, nai 1993 miheca satapang a mikapot, adihayan to ko mitilidan milahecian ningra, ira ko "ano maolah takowanan aka pilaliw; kowapin a sowal:愛我別走""pakonira; kowapin a sowal:自由""o adada no ilol; kowapin a sowal:思念是一種病"ira ho ko romaroma a nitilidan, mikapot aca cingra to ika. Itini to tona 2014 a miheca, pasadaken ningra koya fangcalay a radiw"ci Ayal Komod kako; kowapin a sowal:我是海雅·谷慕", matama malemed cingra to saka 25 a cefang no fangcalay a radiw no kowapin. Tinako 經歷 Kaemang ho ci Ayal Komod mikapot mikihatiy tonano kiwkay a romadiway, na satapang to a maolah to radiw, ya kocong ho cingra i, maolah mafana' a mitengateng , minanam to rowake hananay, mirifet to romadiway a rifet, Misanga'an a radiw 音樂作品 Natayalan 事蹟 Romadiway

張震嶽 I 1974 a miheca saka 5 folad saka 2 a romi'ad itini i Taywan Ilan siyen Soaw cen ko kahofocan ningra, o 'Amis/Pangcah cingra, o misoritay to fangcalay a radiw cingra, nai 1993 miheca satapang a mikapot, adihayan to ko mitilidan milahecian ningra, ira ko "ano maolah takowanan aka pilaliw; kowapin a sowal:愛我別走""pakonira; kowapin a sowal:自由""o adada no ilol; kowapin a sowal:思念是一種病"ira ho ko romaroma a nitilidan, mikapot aca cingra to ika. Itini to tona 2014 a miheca, pasadaken ningra koya fangcalay a radiw"ci Ayal Komod kako; kowapin a sowal:我是海雅·谷慕", matama malemed cingra to saka 25 a cefang no fangcalay a radiw no kowapin. Tinako 經歷 Kaemang ho ci Ayal Komod mikapot mikihatiy tonano kiwkay a romadiway, na satapang to a maolah to radiw, ya kocong ho cingra i, maolah mafana' a mitengateng , minanam to rowake hananay, mirifet to romadiway a rifet, Misanga'an a radiw 音樂作品 Natayalan 事蹟 Romadiway
